text: Federal University of Recôncavo do Bahia (, short UFRB) is a public university in the Brazilian state of Bahia. It was established in 2006. It is located in Cruz das Almas. It is the largest university in the town, and one the country's most successful universities. Category:Colleges and universities in Brazil Category:Bahia Category:2006 establishments Category:2000s establishments in Brazil
title: Federal University of Recôncavo da Bahia
